content: The prices at Inari Sushi Koji may vary depending on the menu and the number of items you order, but on average, a meal at this restaurant can cost around 1,000 to 2,000 yen per person for lunch. They are known for serving affordable and delicious sushi dishes, including their famous inari-zushi (sushi wrapped in sweetened tofu pouches). However, the exact prices and menu items are subject to change, so it's always best to check their website or ask the restaurant directly for up-to-date information.
